title: The Spanish Flu pandemic
itunes:title: The Spanish Flu pandemic
itunes:subtitle: Catharine Arnold joins us to discuss her new book Pandemic: 1918, which explores the story of the influenza outbreak that caused devastation across the globe a century ago
description:
